mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.vehicle_num AS "vehicleNum", a.vehicle_type AS "vehicleType", a.frame_num AS "frameNum", a.engine_num AS "engineNum", a.reg_date AS "regDate", a.insurance_company AS "insuranceCompany", a.premium AS "premium", a.closing_date AS "closingDate", a.third_party_premium AS "thirdPartyPremium", a.third_party_insured_amount AS "thirdPartyInsuredAmount", a.car_damage_insurance AS "carDamageInsurance", a.risk_spontaneous_combustion AS "riskSpontaneousCombustion", a.non_deductible AS "nonDeductible", a.other_insurance AS "otherInsurance", a.closing_date1 AS "closingDate1", a.premium1 AS "premium1", a.insured_amount1 AS "insuredAmount1", a.closing_date2 AS "closingDate2", a.vehicle_vessel_tax AS "vehicleVesselTax", a.total_premium AS "totalPremium", a.compulsory_insurance_num AS "compulsoryInsuranceNum", a.commercial_insurance_order_num AS "commercialInsuranceOrderNum", a.carrier_warranty_num AS "carrierWarrantyNum", a.mark AS "mark", a.driver_license AS "driverLicense", a.query_code AS "queryCode", a.pic AS "pic"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM z_vehicle_insurance a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.vehicle_num LIKE '%'||#{vehicleNum}||'%' '%'+#{vehicleNum}+'%' concat('%',#{vehicleNum},'%')
AND a.frame_num LIKE '%'||#{frameNum}||'%' '%'+#{frameNum}+'%' concat('%',#{frameNum},'%')
AND a.engine_num LIKE '%'||#{engineNum}||'%' '%'+#{engineNum}+'%' concat('%',#{engineNum},'%')
AND a.reg_date BETWEEN #{beginRegDate} AND #{endRegDate}
AND a.compulsory_insurance_num LIKE '%'||#{compulsoryInsuranceNum}||'%' '%'+#{compulsoryInsuranceNum}+'%' concat('%',#{compulsoryInsuranceNum},'%')
AND a.commercial_insurance_order_num LIKE '%'||#{commercialInsuranceOrderNum}||'%' '%'+#{commercialInsuranceOrderNum}+'%' concat('%',#{commercialInsuranceOrderNum},'%')
AND a.carrier_warranty_num LIKE '%'||#{carrierWarrantyNum}||'%' '%'+#{carrierWarrantyNum}+'%' concat('%',#{carrierWarrantyNum},'%')
AND a.driver_license LIKE '%'||#{driverLicense}||'%' '%'+#{driverLicense}+'%' concat('%',#{driverLicense},'%')
AND a.query_code LIKE '%'||#{queryCode}||'%' '%'+#{queryCode}+'%' concat('%',#{queryCode},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO z_vehicle_insurance( id, create_by, update_by, del_flag, create_date, update_date, remarks, vehicle_num, vehicle_type, frame_num, engine_num, reg_date, insurance_company, premium, closing_date, third_party_premium, third_party_insured_amount, car_damage_insurance, risk_spontaneous_combustion, non_deductible, other_insurance, closing_date1, premium1, insured_amount1, closing_date2, vehicle_vessel_tax, total_premium, compulsory_insurance_num, commercial_insurance_order_num, carrier_warranty_num, mark, driver_license, query_code, pic ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{vehicleNum}, #{vehicleType}, #{frameNum}, #{engineNum}, #{regDate}, #{insuranceCompany}, #{premium}, #{closingDate}, #{thirdPartyPremium}, #{thirdPartyInsuredAmount}, #{carDamageInsurance}, #{riskSpontaneousCombustion}, #{nonDeductible}, #{otherInsurance}, #{closingDate1}, #{premium1}, #{insuredAmount1}, #{closingDate2}, #{vehicleVesselTax}, #{totalPremium}, #{compulsoryInsuranceNum}, #{commercialInsuranceOrderNum}, #{carrierWarrantyNum}, #{mark}, #{driverLicense}, #{queryCode}, #{pic} )
mapper.update: UPDATE z_vehicle_insurance SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, vehicle_num = #{vehicleNum}, vehicle_type = #{vehicleType}, frame_num = #{frameNum}, engine_num = #{engineNum}, reg_date = #{regDate}, insurance_company = #{insuranceCompany}, premium = #{premium}, closing_date = #{closingDate}, third_party_premium = #{thirdPartyPremium}, third_party_insured_amount = #{thirdPartyInsuredAmount}, car_damage_insurance = #{carDamageInsurance}, risk_spontaneous_combustion = #{riskSpontaneousCombustion}, non_deductible = #{nonDeductible}, other_insurance = #{otherInsurance}, closing_date1 = #{closingDate1}, premium1 = #{premium1}, insured_amount1 = #{insuredAmount1}, closing_date2 = #{closingDate2}, vehicle_vessel_tax = #{vehicleVesselTax}, total_premium = #{totalPremium}, compulsory_insurance_num = #{compulsoryInsuranceNum}, commercial_insurance_order_num = #{commercialInsuranceOrderNum}, carrier_warranty_num = #{carrierWarrantyNum}, mark = #{mark}, driver_license = #{driverLicense}, query_code = #{queryCode}, pic = #{pic} WHERE id = #{id}
